ygData.msgSnippet: You can have up to 16 chars, but if you have more, you have to post with them all at least once every two days, and they must interact with others alot. I

You can have up to 16 chars, but if you have more, you have to post with them all at least once every two days, and they must interact with others alot. I didn't realize that I'd forgotten to update the welcome message.

The rules page on the site has more info.
